channel.title: CVE Feed for kunalnagar -- Custom 404 Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kunalnagar -- Custom 404 Pro

item.title: CVE-2023-0385|2024-08-02T05:10:55.600Z -- kunalnagar -- custom%20404%20pro
item.description: The Custom 404 Pro plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.7.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the custom_404_pro_admin_init function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete logs, via forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
